alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Darke; Logan; Miami; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:47AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN, EAST CENTRAL DARKE AND NORTHERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 515 AM EDT... At 447 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bradford, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Versailles, Covington, St. Paris, Bradford, West Liberty, De Graff, Hardin, Quincy, Russia, Fletcher, Port Jefferson, Lockington, Westville, Polo, Newbern and Kiser Lake State Park. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 79 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
